translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

I am now sending to São Gabriel, to deliver to the Justice of the Peace Correia, so that he may forward it to Your Lordship.

God keep Your Lordship, Most Illustrious Sir João Antônio da Silveira. Secretariat of War Caçapava, December 26, 1839 Serafim Joaquim de Alencastre

Secretariat of the Republic To the citizen Colonel João Antônio da Silveira, Commander of the Right Division, wherever he may be. S. Gabriel Stamp at
